title: Edguy - 2001 - Mandrake [320kbs] ~~Renovatio~~
description:
Mandrake is the fifth album by German power metal band Edguy, released in 2001. It is a varied album, exploring many styles of the power metal genre. It was their last studio album for AFM Records. Later they signed a new contract with Nuclear Blast.
